title: Noam Chomsky interview on his Life and Career (2003)
description:
In this in depth interview with Noam Chomsky, he talked about his life and career as a political activist and critic of U.S. foreign policy. He also responded to questions from viewers on the telephone and submitted by fax and e-mail.
